description:
The aim of this talk is to give a introduction to what data science is,
what kind of problems it can solve and how to solve them. Participants
will learn both with theory and a practical problem to understand the
end-to- end data science process. The contents will include:

-  What is data science
-  Data preprocessing and data manipulation
-  Natural Language Processing (NLP)
-  Machine Learning

The talk is tailored for people interested in data science who do not
have previous knowledge about the topic, but have basic knowledge of
general computer science topics.
title: Introduction to Data Science
